Critical UX Fixes - Intern First-Time Experience

üö® CRITICAL PROBLEMS IDENTIFIED

1. Empty State Hell

  • Opportunities tab: ‚ÄúNo career paths available. Contact your administrator.‚Äù ‚ùå
  • My Projects tab: Three empty sections with no guidance ‚ùå
  • Landing page: Too wordy, unclear CTAs ‚ùå
  • No onboarding flow: Interns are completely lost ‚ùå

2. Navigation Confusion

  • Tab names don‚Äôt match user mental models
  • No clear ‚Äúnext step‚Äù guidance
  • Empty states provide no actionable path forward

3. Missing Critical Features

  • No profile completion prompt
  • No ‚Äúgetting started‚Äù checklist
  • No sample/demo content
  • No contextual help

‚úÖ IMMEDIATE FIXES IMPLEMENTED

Fix 1: Better Empty States with Clear CTAs

Opportunities Tab (Career Paths)

BEFORE: "No career paths available. Contact your administrator."
AFTER: 
"üéØ Get Started with Your IBM Journey

Career paths help match you with exciting projects. Here's how to begin:

1. Complete your profile (skills, interests, availability)
2. Browse featured projects below
3. Leaders will invite you to projects that match your interests

[Complete Your Profile] [Browse Featured Projects]

Fix 2: My Projects Tab - Actionable Empty States

BEFORE: ‚ÄúYou are not currently managing any projects.‚Äù AFTER:

"üëã Welcome to Your Projects!

You don't have any active projects yet, but that's about to change!

Next Steps:
‚úì Complete your profile to get discovered
‚úì Express interest in career paths
‚úì Wait for project invitations from leaders

[Set Up Your Profile] [Explore Opportunities]

Fix 3: Landing Page - Clearer Value Prop

BEFORE: Long paragraph about ‚Äúconnects new joiners‚Ä¶‚Äù AFTER:

"Find Your Next IBM Project

Get matched with real projects that build your skills and advance your career.

For Co-ops & Interns:
‚Ä¢ Get invited to projects that match your interests
‚Ä¢ Build real-world experience
‚Ä¢ Grow your IBM network

[Get Started] [Learn More]

üìã IMPLEMENTATION PLAN

Phase 1: Emergency Fixes (NOW)

  1. ‚úÖ Update empty state copy in AmbitionsTab
  2. ‚úÖ Update empty state copy in YourProjectsTab
  3. ‚úÖ Add actionable CTAs to all empty states
  4. ‚úÖ Simplify landing page hero

Phase 2: Onboarding Flow (NEXT)

  1. Create ‚ÄúGetting Started‚Äù checklist component
  2. Add profile completion progress bar
  3. Show sample/demo projects for empty states
  4. Add contextual tooltips

Phase 3: Discovery Features (FUTURE)

  1. Featured projects section (always visible)
  2. ‚ÄúRecommended for you‚Äù based on partial profile
  3. Success stories/testimonials
  4. Quick wins (easy first projects)

üé® UX PRINCIPLES APPLIED

  1. Never show empty without action - Every empty state must have a clear next step
  2. Progressive disclosure - Show what‚Äôs relevant now, hide complexity
  3. Positive framing - ‚ÄúGet started‚Äù not ‚ÄúNothing here‚Äù
  4. Clear hierarchy - Most important action is most prominent
  5. Reduce cognitive load - One clear path forward

üìä SUCCESS METRICS

  • Time to first profile completion: < 5 minutes
  • Time to first career path selection: < 2 minutes
  • Bounce rate on empty states: < 20%
  • User satisfaction (first session): > 4/5
